page.title: 09Home Life
page.content: Home Life - Every day I watch t.v. and if there are programes I am going to miss, if I am going out to tea we put it on the video.In the evening I listen to the stereo and sometimes play on the computer ,sometimes I play with my electronic games. Some of us have dishwashers, so that we don't have to wash up, other domestic appliances are washing machines, vacuum cleaners, microwave ovens, sandwich makers. Some telephones are now portable and you can have one in your car if you are rich. Some of the food we eat is already prepared and only needs heating before eating, these are kept in the freezer. There are also instant foods such as mashed potato,deserts and toppings. We also like fried foods a lot.
